amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the preamble to the establishment of the National Landscape Conservation System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 in House Report 110-573 to strike the preamble to the establishment of the National Landscape Conservation System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 246 (Roll no. 168).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
